模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit

接口 Updatable

所有已知实现类:
Boss, Bubble, Creature, DropDecorator, Enemy, EnemyProjectile, Fruit, Hero, HeroProjectile, Potion, ProjectileObject, Star, Treasure, UpdatableObject
public interface Updatable
The com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Updatable interface means the ability for UpdatableObject to update its attributes
